details: Initialized task module for task board hint and reordering
Reviewed AI task contract and current_index.json to confirm ordering rules before implementation.
Audited TaskBoard + useTasks to map ordering state and ensure React Query mutation (reorderTasks) can accept drag updates.
Confirmed ai/tasks/order.json remains the canonical ordering metadata so we avoid renaming task folders and keep current_index.json untouched.
Added docs/task_reordering.md plus related references so every agent knows how the drag workflow updates ai/tasks/order.json.
Updated TaskBoard header copy to remind users the AI works top-to-bottom.
Replaced move buttons with drag-and-drop interactions that preview order locally before PATCHing /api/tasks/order.
Confirmed PATCH /api/tasks/order -> reorderTaskList writes ai/tasks/order.json without touching current_index, so the drag UI persists canonically.
Verified scripts/reorder_tasks.ts still provides CLI ordering support aligned with the new drag workflow.
Hooked TaskBoard reorder flow to log a step_completed entry on the active task after PATCH /api/tasks/order.
Updated AI contract Source of Truth section to mention ai/tasks/order.json and logging requirements.
Linked README to docs/task_reordering.md so backlog priority workflow is discoverable.

Reordered tasks -> TASK_007_ndjson_diff_logging, TASK_009_task_board_reorder, TASK_008_milestone_container, TASK_001_requirements_architecture, TASK_002_schema_contract_baseline, TASK_003_file_access_layer, TASK_004_local_editor_backend, TASK_005_local_editor_ui, TASK_006_structured_prompt_generators

Reordered tasks -> TASK_009_task_board_reorder, TASK_007_ndjson_diff_logging, TASK_008_milestone_container, TASK_001_requirements_architecture, TASK_002_schema_contract_baseline, TASK_003_file_access_layer, TASK_004_local_editor_backend, TASK_005_local_editor_ui, TASK_006_structured_prompt_generators
Ran npm run test to cover server + generator flows after adding task board logging.
Ran npm run schema:lint after fixing legacy log statuses to keep ordering metadata valid.
Extended server reorder test to assert ai/tasks/current_index.json stays on the same task.
Verified reorder test now covers ordering metadata + active-task invariants.
Manual UI verified: hint renders, drag reorder works, refresh shows updated order.
Task board hint + drag reorder complete; docs updated and auto-logging enabled.

Reordered tasks -> TASK_007_ndjson_diff_logging, TASK_008_milestone_container, TASK_009_task_board_reorder, TASK_001_requirements_architecture, TASK_002_schema_contract_baseline, TASK_003_file_access_layer, TASK_004_local_editor_backend, TASK_005_local_editor_ui, TASK_006_structured_prompt_generators
